short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click to search text on Amazon.in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The user can install this to make it easier to search for a text (or item). I believe this will improve productivity by not constantly copying and pasting text as well as opening https://www.amazon.in, clicking on search box and pasting the copied text.
